meanings.definition: The process of treating soil with lime to improve its fertility.
meanings.sent1: After liming the soil, the plants grew healthier and stronger.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use liming to make the soil better for growing crops.
meanings.sent3: The garden was so happy after receiving its liming treatment.
meanings.sent4: Liming the soil was like giving it a magical potion for growth.
meanings.sent5: The liming process turned the dull soil into a vibrant paradise for plants.

meanings.definition: The act of socializing or relaxing in a casual manner.
meanings.sent1: We had a great time liming at the beach with friends.
meanings.sent2: Liming with buddies is a fun way to unwind after a long week.
meanings.sent3: Liming at the park felt like a mini vacation from our busy lives.
meanings.sent4: She always looks forward to liming with her pals on weekends.
meanings.sent5: Liming together brought them closer as friends and created lasting memories.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a lime-based substance to surfaces to brighten or disinfect them.
meanings.sent1: The liming of the walls made the room look fresh and clean.
meanings.sent2: Liming the floors with a special solution made them sparkle.
meanings.sent3: The house felt brand new after a thorough liming session.
meanings.sent4: The liming process transformed the dingy surfaces into shining beacons.
meanings.sent5: The liming treatment gave the surfaces a radiant glow that lasted for days.
